entities: International Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia
summary: The Security Council, recalling its previous resolutions 1775 (2007), 1503 (2003), and 1534 (2004), decides to appoint Mr. Serge Brammertz as Prosecutor of the International Tribunal for the former Yugoslavia, effective 1 January 2008, for a four-year term, subject to earlier termination upon completion of the Tribunal's work. The appointment follows the nomination by the Secretary-General and takes into account the Tribunal's completion strategy to finish trial activities by 2008 and all work by 2010.
